inclusion.criterion: Adult male or female patients age 18-75
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: HCV infection identified by positive, quantifiable HCV RNA prior to transplant
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Scheduled recipient of living donor transplantation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of chronic hepatitis B or HIV infection
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: coinfection with HBV, but no history of HIV

exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: BP: 130/75, HR: 90/min, but no estimate of GFR

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or breast feeding and men or women that are sexually active but do not agree to use acceptable birth control
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of pregnancy, breastfeeding, or lack of birth control

notes: 55-year-old man with HCV coinfection with HBV. On IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.
